Hi, I'm Vicente Tejero Caballero, a Civil Industrial Engineering student with a passion for data analytics, technology, and finance. Welcome to my personal website where I showcase my projects, share my professional journey, and provide insights into my areas of interest.

## Featured Projects

### Implementation of Rational Attention Experiment

A study on how decision-makers consider ESG criteria when making investment decisions. Part of my final thesis and the FONDECYT project "[Drivers of Sustainable Finance](https://sebacea.github.io/drivers/)".

### ESG Educational Capsules

Creating educational videos about ESG criteria, their regulations, and evolution worldwide.
